channel.title: Macos on Embrace The Red
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on Embrace The Red

item.title: Grabbing and cracking macOS hashes
item.description: Information for red teaming macOS and info on real world TTPs are still a bit sparse. That makes it difficult for defenders to know what attackers do on macOS compared to Windows. Some organizations might have a bigger blind spot when it comes to macOS. This post describes how an adversary can grab hashes from a macOS machine, how to convert it to a hashcat friendly format and use hashcat to crack it.
